meanings.sent1: She outthrows the ball to her friend.
meanings.sent2: He outthrows the trash every morning.
meanings.sent3: The magician outthrows a rabbit from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun outthrows its rays across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The chef outthrows the dough to make a pizza.

meanings.definition: The act of throwing or casting out
meanings.sent2: The outthrows of the baseball player impressed the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The outthrows of confetti at the party added to the festive atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The outthrows of emotions overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent5: The outthrows of seeds by the farmer ensured a good harvest.
